dct_description_sm: Town map of Montclair and Glen Ridge. In addition to the printed pink and green sections, parklands were colored by hand in yellow and a trolley line drawn in red. The notation, fire limits in green, is also written with an indecipherable signature and the year of '06. A street directory is shown in the lower right corner.
dct_publisher_sm: Interstate Map Company, Engravers and Publishers, Newark NJ
